mapper.sql: id , yearid, unitid, monthid, yearagentmoney, yearaddmoney, yearlendoutmoney, yearlendinmoney, yearexecutemoney, m, total, subjectid, remark, addmoney, lendoutmoney, lendinmoney, executemoney, createtime, updatetime, revenueformula, ccratioformula, monthbusiness
mapper.select: SELECT subject.id AS id, subject.parentid AS parentId, subject.code AS subjectCode, subject.leafflag AS leaf, subject.`name` AS subjectName, monthSubject.total AS monthMoney, monthSubject.monthbusiness AS monthBusiness, yearSubject.total AS yearMoney, yearSubject.addmoney AS yearAddMoney, yearSubject.lendinmoney AS yearLendInMoney, yearSubject.lendoutmoney AS yearLendOutMoney, yearSubject.executemoney AS yearExecuteMoney, yearSubject.revenueformula AS yearRevenueFormula, unit.id AS unitId, unit.name AS unitName, yearPeriod.period AS yearPeriod, yearPeriod.code AS yearCode, monthPeriod.id AS monthId, monthPeriod.period AS monthPeriod, subject.orderno FROM budget_month_subject AS monthSubject INNER JOIN budget_subject subject ON monthSubject.subjectid = subject.id INNER JOIN budget_year_subject yearSubject ON yearSubject.unitid = monthSubject.unitid and yearSubject.subjectid = monthSubject.subjectid INNER JOIN budget_unit unit ON unit.id = monthSubject.unitid INNER JOIN budget_year_period yearPeriod on yearPeriod.id = monthSubject.yearid INNER JOIN budget_month_period monthPeriod ON monthPeriod.id = monthSubject.monthid where monthSubject.unitid = #{budgetUnitId} and monthSubject.monthid = #{monthId} order by subject.orderno

select m.*, subject.id AS id, subject.parentid AS parentId, subject.`name` AS subjectName, subject.code AS subjectCode from (SELECT monthSubject.yearid, monthSubject.subjectid, monthSubject.monthid, SUM(yearSubject.total) AS yearMoney, SUM(yearSubject.addmoney) AS yearAddMoney, SUM(yearSubject.lendinmoney) AS yearLendInMoney, SUM(yearSubject.lendoutmoney) AS yearLendOutMoney, SUM(yearSubject.executemoney) AS yearExecuteMoney, SUM(monthSubject.total) AS monthMoney, SUM(monthSubject.revenueformula) AS yearRevenueFormula, GROUP_CONCAT(monthSubject.monthbusiness) AS monthBusiness FROM budget_month_subject monthSubject INNER JOIN budget_unit bu ON monthSubject.unitid = bu.id INNER JOIN budget_year_subject yearSubject ON yearSubject.unitid = monthSubject.unitid and yearSubject.subjectid = monthSubject.subjectid where bu.`name` != '直营总公司' and monthsubject.id not in ( SELECT bms.id from budget_month_subject bms left JOIN budget_unit bu on bms.unitid = bu.id WHERE bu.`name` != '直营总公司' and (bu.`name` LIKE '%省区' or bu.`name` in ('拓展部', '省区预留')) and bms.yearid = #{yearId} and bms.monthid = #{monthId} and bms.subjectid in (select id from budget_subject bs WHERE bs.`name` in ('辅助性指标', '销售码洋', '试卷销售码洋', '图书销售码洋', '底价收入', '试卷收入', '图书收入') and bs.yearid = #{yearId}) ) GROUP BY monthSubject.yearid, monthSubject.monthid, monthSubject.subjectid) m INNER JOIN budget_subject subject ON m.subjectid = subject.id WHERE m.yearid = #{yearId} and m.monthid = #{monthId}

select bms.total AS monthMoney, bys.total AS yearMoney, bys.addmoney AS yearAddMoney, bys.lendinmoney AS yearLendInMoney, bys.lendoutmoney AS yearLendOutMoney, bys.executemoney AS yearExecuteMoney, bys.revenueformula AS yearRevenueFormula from budget_month_subject bms left join budget_unit unit on unit.id = bms.unitid INNER JOIN budget_year_subject bys ON bys.unitid = bms.unitid and bys.subjectid = bms.subjectid where bms.subjectid = #{subjectId} and bms.monthid = #{monthId} and unit.name != '直营总公司' and unit.`name` != '供应中心'
